name: Player Goes Jump
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

I need some Beta testers to help my develop my game! If testers what you can get your name or alias in the game. Hidden around and in the credits for helping test the game!


About the Game

Player Goes Jump. This is a 2d side scrolling platformer. The game has multiple ending and lots of different ways to play! It includes a shop where you can purchase different thing to play the game, either making it easier to kill enemies or to collect more money. The different ending include the main ending which people will get mostly after completing the game but there are different ending that you can get throughout playing the game! One ending hint: "Go left when life starts!" There is a shop in the game which you can use to buy more powerful weapon power or make enemies have less health, but there is also options to build more blocks to areas to collect more points or powerups to help you play the game! I would like to spend some time thanking my girlfriend Courtney who without her help and support I wouldn't be able to get this game done!

Player Goes Jump.
This is a 2d side scrolling platformer. The game has multiple ending and lots of different ways to play! It includes a shop where you can purchase different thing to play the game, either making it easier to kill enemies or to collect more money.

The different ending include the main ending which people will get mostly after completing the game but there are different ending that you can get throughout playing the game!
One ending hint: "Go left when life starts!"

There is a shop in the game which you can use to buy more powerful weapon power or make enemies have less health, but there is also options to build more blocks to areas to collect more points or powerups to help you play the game!

short_description: A quick paced platformer with enemies (friendly and non-friendly) that you can kill to earn points and rewards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game doesn't take to much from your computer at this moment because it is not that heavy of an application.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game doesn't take to much from your computer at this moment because it is not that heavy of an application.
